00012 ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::ORAcqirisDC440Decoder() { fDataRecord = NULL; }
00013 
00014 void ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::Swap(UInt_t* dataRecord)
00015 {
00016   // Given that there is a 16-bit buffer, we have to swap things if there has 
00017   // been a switch of endian-ness.  This means the data looks like 2143 and it 
00018   // needs to look like 1234, so we just need to swap the 16-bit words. 
00019   // The first long word has already been swapped.  There is a header of length
00020   // kBufHeadLen that needs to be swapped as longs.
00021   ORLog(kDebug) << "Calling Swap()" << std::endl; 
00022   UInt_t lengthOfBuffer = LengthOf(dataRecord);
00023   if(lengthOfBuffer < 2) return;
00024   for(size_t i=1;i<kBufHeadLen; i++) {
00025     ORUtils::Swap(dataRecord[i]);
00026   }
00027   UShort_t* theShortDataRecord = (UShort_t*) (dataRecord + kBufHeadLen);
00028   for(size_t i=0;i<2*(lengthOfBuffer-1);i++) {
00029     ORUtils::Swap(theShortDataRecord[i]);
00030   }
00031 }
00032 
00033 bool ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::SetDataRecord(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00034 {
00035   fDataRecord = dataRecord;
00036   ORLog(kDebug) << "SetDataRecord(): Setting the data record..." << std::endl;
00037   return true;
00038 }

00040 double ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetSamplingFrequency()
00041 {
00042   return 1./GetSampleInterval();
00043 }
00044 
00045 size_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::CopyWaveformData(Short_t* waveform, size_t len)
00046 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00047 //waveform, which is of length len
00048 {
00049   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00050   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00051   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00052     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00053                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00054   }
00055   else {
00056     len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00057   }
00058   UShort_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00059   memcpy(waveform, waveformData, sizeof(UShort_t)*len);
00060   return len;
00061 }
00062 
00063 size_t ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::CopyWaveformDataDouble(double* waveform, size_t len)
00064 //copies the waveform data to the array pointed to by
00065 //waveform, which is of length len
00066 {
00067   size_t wflen = GetWaveformLen();
00068   if (wflen == 0) return 0;
00069   if ((len < wflen) || (len == 0)) {
00070     ORLog(kWarning) << "CopyWaveformData(): destination array length is " << len 
00071                     << "; waveform data length is " << GetWaveformLen() << std::endl;
00072   }
00073   else {
00074     len = GetWaveformLen(); 
00075   }
00076   UShort_t* waveformData = GetWaveformDataPointer();
00077   for(size_t i=0;i<len;i++) 
00078   {
00079     waveform[i] = (Double_t) waveformData[i];  
00080   }
00081   return len;
00082 }

00100 double ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::GetSampleInterval()
00101 {
00102   /* sampleInterval is in microseconds, but we want it in nano seconds. */
00103   return 1e3*GetRealValueFromKey("sampleInterval", CrateOf(), CardOf());
00104 }

00139 
00140 bool ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::IsValid() 
00141 { 
00142   ORLog(kDebug) << "IsValid(): starting... " << std::endl;
00143   if(IsShort(fDataRecord)) { 
00144     ORLog(kError) << "Data file is short" << std::endl; 
00145     return false;
00146   } 
00147   return true;
00148 }
00149 
00150 void ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::DumpBufferHeader()
00151 {
00152   if(fDataRecord)
00153   {
00154     ORLog(kDebug) << "Dumping Data Buffer Header (Raw Data): " << std::endl;
00155     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00156     for(size_t i=1;i<kBufHeadLen; i++)
00157     {
00158       ORLog(kDebug) << fDataRecord[i] << std::endl;
00159     }
00160     ORLog(kDebug) << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00161   }
00162 }

00167 
00168 void ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::Dump(UInt_t* dataRecord) //debugging 
00169 {
00170   ORLog(kDebug) << std::endl << std::endl << "ORAcqirisDC440Decoder::Dump():" << std::endl ;
00171   if(!SetDataRecord(dataRecord)) return; 
00172   ORLog(kDebug) << "  Header functions: " << std::endl
00173     << "    Crate = " << CrateOf() << "; card = " << CardOf() << std::endl
00174     << "    The buffer is " << kBufHeadLen << " (32-bit) words long" << std::endl
00175     << "    The channel is " << GetChannelNum() << std::endl
00176     << "    Timestamp: " << GetTimeStamp() << std::endl
00177     << "    Index offset: " << GetIndexOffset() << std::endl
00178     << "    The waveform data has " << GetWaveformLen() << " (16-bit) words" << std::endl;
00179 }
